metaTags.metaDescription: Simplify your network architecture to boost resilience, security, and performance for AI-powered enterprise environments.

relatedBlades.title: Modernize enterprise networks
relatedBlades.copy: Use the Cloudflare network to simplify enterprise connectivity — make your network more performant, reliable, and secure.

relatedBlades.title: Networks become complex, brittle, and inefficient over time
relatedBlades.copy: Networks become complex, brittle, and operationally inefficient over time. Many traditional and cloud-based security products make the complexity problem even worse, due to the narrow focus of their capabilities.

columnContent.title: Inflexible
columnContent.description: Traditional networking was not designed for rapid expansion, cloud applications, and hybrid work — leaving organizations unable to adapt to changing market conditions.

columnContent.title: Expensive
columnContent.description: Legacy networks are operationally expensive, due to the cost of purchasing and maintaining appliances, and around-the-clock administration.

columnContent.title: Insecure
columnContent.description: Internal networks have coarse access controls, which allow too much access and open the door to lateral movement.

relatedBlades.title: Modernize your network infrastructure with Cloudflare
relatedBlades.copy: Eliminate networking and security appliances, and adopt the [Cloudflare connectivity cloud](https://www.cloudflare.com/connectivity-cloud/). It delivers secure, fast, and reliable service to any point in the world, and easily adapts to new business requirements.

columnContent.title: Network protection for data centers
columnContent.description: Protect public-facing infrastructure from external threats with [Magic Transit](https://www.cloudflare.com/network-services/products/magic-transit/) and [Magic Firewall](https://www.cloudflare.com/network-services/products/magic-firewall/).

columnContent.title: Zero Trust/SSE/SASE
columnContent.description: Protect users and secure applications with [Cloudflare One](https://www.cloudflare.com/zero-trust/), our Zero Trust cloud security and connectivity platform.

columnContent.title: Coffee shop networking
columnContent.description: Simplify branch connectivity by reducing the hardware footprint using [Magic WAN](https://www.cloudflare.com/network-services/products/magic-wan/).

columnContent.title: Cloud networking
columnContent.description: Re-establish network visibility and control within and between clouds with [Magic cloud networking](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://developers.cloudflare.com/magic-cloud-networking/).

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Use Cloudflare for networking to strengthen your business continuity, improve the user experience, and reduce operating costs

statsFeatures.description: lower total cost of ownership (TCO) for security and IT investments

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Credit Saison India powers secure, scalable, and cost-effective nationwide workforce and infrastructure expansion with Cloudflare

content.value: Credit Saison India sought a security infrastructure that did not require extensive equipment upgrades or a patchwork of third-party software solutions to support a hybrid workforce of employees, partners, and contractors. Simplifying technology management was another priority.

After conducting extensive research, Credit Saison India selected Cloudflare One, the unified platform that brings together Cloudflare's Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) and networking solutions — all secured on the Cloudflare global network.
Using Cloudflare, Credit Saison India now secures employees, and public and private networks, without additional hardware, difficult-to-maintain VPNs, or excessive infrastructure investments.
"We made the right decision early, and it empowered us to scale confidently. Being prepared and proactive with Cloudflare will save us a lot of time and money in the long term."

features.title: Melbourne Airport
features.description: Melbourne Airport streamlined their complex cyber security infrastructure and mitigated DDoS threats from potential hacktivists by using Cloudflare to ensure uptime for all traveler services.

features.title: Estonian Railways

features.title: UN Women Australia
features.description: After fraudulent transaction attempts from attackers disrupted fundraising efforts, UN Women Australia switched to a payment gateway that offered better security and worked to future-proof their site.
